an5.206:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kamesu avitarago hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaso avigataparilaho avigatatanho.
an5.206:1.4: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kamesu avitarago hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaso avigataparilaho avigatatanho, tassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
an5.206:1.5: Yassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, ayam pathamo cetasovinibandho.
an5.206:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye avitarago hoti …pe…
an5.206:2.3: yavadattham udaravadehakam bhunjitva seyyasukham passasukham middhasukham anuyutto viharati …pe…
an5.206:2.4: annataram devanikayam panidhaya brahmacariyam carati: ‘iminaham silena va vatena va tapena va brahmacariyena va devo va bhavissami devannataro va’ti.
an5.206:2.5: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu annataram devanikayam panidhaya brahmacariyam carati: ‘iminaham silena va vatena va tapena va brahmacariyena va devo va bhavissami devannataro va’ti, tassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
an5.206:2.6: Yassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, ayam pancamo cetasovinibandho.
